Description:

Name: Idania Roberta Sevilla Raudales
Description:
Idania Roberta owned a beauty Salon. She was killed in her own apartment. Her body was found more than 24 hours after the killing. The victim's hands and feet were tied together, and the throat showed the wound of a knife.

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: La prensa, online portal, 29.11.2010

Name: Sandra (Sandro Heleno)
Description:

Name: Valentina (Oscar Andres Triana Lozano)
Description:
Valentina's body was found on 28 November in a state of decomposition in a tank. She had been missing for eight days. The eyes and one hand were missing. Locals assume that swine living in the area ate the hand. Relatives belief that Valentina became a victim of hatred of travestis. She had moved from Medellin to Ibague recently.

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: Ecos del Combeima, online portal, 29.11.2010; El Tiempo, online portal (w/o date)

Name: Alison
Description:
Alison was a hairdresser and was found half naked.
